## Acceptance Criteria

- Design & Technical Review
  - [Style Guide](https://stenciljs.com/docs/style-guide)
- Document changes with a changeset
- Testing
  - Visual
  - Functional (component test)
  - Browser
    - Desktop
      - Chrome
      - Edge
      - Safari
      - Firefox
    - Tablet
      - iPad (Landscape / Portrait)
    - Mobile
      - Safari iOS
      - Chrome Preview
